mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gall_list (gall_num, gall_name, table_name) VALUES (gall_num.nextval, #{gall_name}, #{table_name})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gall_list ORDER BY gall_num DESC
mapper.update: CREATE table ${gall_name} ( board_num number(10, 0), board_title varchar2 (20), board_content varchar2 (2000), writer VARCHAR2 (20), nameless char(1) default 'N' check(nameless in ('Y','N')), w_date date default sysdate, m_date date default sysdate, like_count number default 0, replycount number default 0, hit number default 0 )

CREATE table ${gall_name}_reply ( reply_num number(10, 0), board_num number (10, 0), parent_num number null, reply_content varchar2(200), writer VARCHAR2 (20), w_date date default sysdate, m_date date default sysdate, hit number default 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT gall_name FROM gall_list WHERE table_name = #{table_name}
